name: vsc-organize-imports
description: Organize imports in ts/js files. (Keep line structure (single-line/multi-line) and keeps comments)

vscOrganizeImports.orderSpecifiers.title: Sort named imports
vscOrganizeImports.orderSpecifiers.description: Sort each imports named specifiers. ex: import { a, b, c }

vscOrganizeImports.orderSpecifiersAsSing.title: Make import as single lines
vscOrganizeImports.orderSpecifiersAsSing.description: This is only applied if 'Sort named imports' is true. If this is false the output will be multi-line.

vscOrganizeImports.baseUrl.title: Base url
vscOrganizeImports.baseUrl.description: The base url, from root path, for matching absolute paths

vscOrganizeImports.emptyLinesAfterGlobal.title: Empty Lines After Global Imports
vscOrganizeImports.emptyLinesAfterGlobal.description: Number of empty lines after global imports

vscOrganizeImports.emptyLinesAfterAbsolu.title: Empty Lines After Absolute Imports
vscOrganizeImports.emptyLinesAfterAbsolu.description: Number of empty lines after absolute imports

vscOrganizeImports.emptyLinesLocalImport.title: Empty Lines After Local Imports
vscOrganizeImports.emptyLinesLocalImport.description: Number of empty lines after local imports

vscOrganizeImports.emptyLinesAfterImport.title: Empty Lines After All Imports
vscOrganizeImports.emptyLinesAfterImport.description: Number of empty lines after all imports
